div.h3:
You are not registered for the CFO Junior Competition
Click the button below to register for the CFO Junior Competition.

div.p: You cannot upload the report until the following members have updated their bio.

form.div:
All Aspirants,partners and associates of The CFO Case Study Competition and its related contests (The CFO Junior), are inter-alia bound by the spirit and rules covered in the following sections of The Competition Rules:
Section 1: About the competitions
Section 2: Participant, team eligibility and registration
Section 3: Communication
Section 4: Competition format stages
Section 5: Penalties and non compliance
Section 6: Intellectual property
Section 7:Consent and release
Section 8:Disclaimers
Section 9: Official prize, prize transfer or substitution
Section 10: Applicable laws and jurisdiction
Section 11: Adjudication and outcomes
By getting involved in any shape or form, you agree to be bound by the detailed rules downloadable in pdf version at: Competition Rules.
Please accept competition rules
Submit HOME

div.p: No report has been uploaded yet.
Leader And Member Should Be Different From Admin

Enter the name you will like your team to be called. E.g. if you choose Caledonia, your team will be referred to as Team CALEDONIA from University of Buea, Cameroon or Team CALEDONIA from AnglogoldAshanti, South Africa.

div.h3: Maximum team size is 3. You can invite them here.
div.h4: Members added and their details will display underneath.

t.lable: Leader has already joined another team!
Member has already joined another team!

Ambassador has already joined another team!

table.th: Submit CFO Report Please upload a PDF and a DOC version of the report in the section provide on the right.

Brand Ambassador Mentor Confirmation Kindly confirm your Brand Ambassador and Mnetor.The existing for your team are listed below should either of them changed,enter the email address of the new one and click the invite button to invite them to your team.if details listed below are correct,kindly click the confirm button.

div.p: Please Upload PDF and DOC Files First!!!!!

h5.p: All Aspirant,Partner and associates of THE CFO Case Study Competition and its related contests(THE CFO Junior), (The CFO Brand Ambassadors Award and)The CFO Social Media Award are inter-alia bound by the spirit and rules coverd in the following section of the Competition Rule

tbody.li: Section 8: Official prize, prize transfer or substitution
tbody.p: In as much as compliance to THE CFO (and CFO junior) case Study Competition/s Rules Was Competition/s Rules was completed during the registration process and update of your bio.in the spirit of the competition and for this submission process of your report.you agree to be bound by the detailed rules downloadable in pdf version at:

span.input: I aknowledge that the report is entirly the work of my team and that it does not incorporate the intellectual property of any other party.
